scripts.build-quarkus:dev:darwin:linux: cd quarkus-app && pnpm install:mvnw && mvn clean install -DskipTests
scripts.build-quarkus:dev:win32: cd quarkus-app && pnpm install:mvnw && pnpm powershell "mvn clean install `-DskipTests"
scripts.build-quarkus:prod:darwin:linux: cd quarkus-app && pnpm install:mvnw && mvn clean install -DskipTests=$(build-env tests.run --not) -Dmaven.test.failure.ignore=$(build-env tests.ignoreFailures)
scripts.build-quarkus:prod:win32: cd quarkus-app && pnpm install:mvnw && pnpm powershell "mvn clean install `-DskipTests=$(build-env tests.run --not) `-Dmaven.test.failure.ignore=$(build-env tests.ignoreFailures)"
scripts.create-test-image:build-only: kie-tools--image-builder build $(pnpm image:tag-info | tail -1) $(pnpm image:build-args | tail -1)
scripts.create-test-image:kind: kie-tools--image-builder kind $(pnpm image:tag-info | tail -1) $(pnpm image:build-args | tail -1) --kind-cluster-name kie-sandbox-dev-cluster
scripts.create-test-image:minikube: kie-tools--image-builder minikube $(pnpm image:tag-info | tail -1) $(pnpm image:build-args | tail -1)
scripts.create-test-image:openshift: kie-tools--image-builder openshift $(pnpm image:tag-info | tail -1) $(pnpm image:build-args | tail -1)
scripts.image:build-args: echo "--build-arg QUARKUS_PLATFORM_VERSION=$(build-env quarkusPlatform.version) --build-arg KOGITO_RUNTIME_VERSION=$(build-env kogitoRuntime.version) --build-arg ROOT_PATH=/"
scripts.image:docker:build: kie-tools--image-builder build $(pnpm image:tag-info | tail -1) $(pnpm image:build-args | tail -1) -p
scripts.image:podman:build: kie-tools--image-builder build $(pnpm image:tag-info | tail -1) $(pnpm image:build-args | tail -1) -e podman
scripts.image:tag-info: echo -r "$(pnpm build-env devDeploymentBaseImage.registry)" -a "$(pnpm build-env devDeploymentBaseImage.account)" -n "$(pnpm build-env devDeploymentBaseImage.name)" -t "$(pnpm build-env devDeploymentBaseImage.tags)"
scripts.quarkus:dev: cd quarkus-app && mvn clean package quarkus:dev -DskipTests
